import React, { useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../../components/Navbar"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; const NewInvoice = () => { const [writingDirection, setWritingDirection] = useState("ltr"); const [message, setMessage] = useState("Hello World"); const [services, setServices] = useState([ { id: "asd654asd", service: "Tailoring", }, { id: "asd654asd", service: "Tailoring", }, { id: "asd654asd", service: "Tailoring", }, ]); const [products, setProducts] = useState([ { id: "asd654asd", name: "Shoes", }, { id: "asd654asd", name: "Shoes", }, { id: "asd654asd", name: "Shoes", }, ]); const customer = { name: "John", surname: "Doe", dependents: [ {customer_name: "James"}, {customer_name: "Mark"}, {customer_name: "Luke"}, ] }; const invoice = { id: "asd654asd", products: [ { choice: "Shoes", quantity: 55, price: 59.99, }, { choice: "Shoes", quantity: 55, price: 59.99, }, { choice: "Shoes", quantity: 55, price: 59.99, }, ], services: [ { id: "asd654asd", service: "Tailoring", price: 29.99, }, { id: "asd654asd", service: "Tailoring", price: 29.99, }, { id: "asd654asd", service: "Tailoring", price: 29.99, }, ], dependents: [ {customer_name: "James"}, {customer_name: "Mark"}, {customer_name: "Luke"}, ] }; return ( <>
Invoices

New Invoice for {customer.name}

{message}

{invoice.products && invoice.products.map((product) => ( ))} {invoice.services && invoice.services.map((service) => ( ))} {invoice.dependents && invoice.dependents.map((dependent) => ( ))}

{invoice[0]}
Total Invoice
Customer Details
Company Date
Khamco
); }; export default NewInvoice;
